Hello World, Lets Code!

This webpack bolier plate conatins:

  • Html Loader with server setup for local development
  • Sass itegrated with minify css
  • Use Babel for ES6 to ES5
  • File loader configured to include images
  • Bootstrap and font awesome added
  • Use npm run dev for development environment
  • Use npm run build for production environment
  • Deploy to github using npm deploy
